task.title: Update dashboard models (Cursor + Codex) using Claude Code settings schema as reference

events.content: Referenced Claude Code settings JSON schema from schemastore.org https://www.schemastore.org/claude-code-settings.json: Referenced Claude Code settings JSON schema from schemastore.org

raw.question: Referenced Claude Code settings JSON schema from schemastore.org
raw.chosen: Referenced Claude Code settings JSON schema from schemastore.org
raw.reasoning: Schema defines all valid Claude Code settings including model config, permissions (allow/deny/ask rules with tool patterns), hooks (PreToolUse, PostToolUse, etc. with command/prompt/agent types), sandbox config, MCP server management, plugin marketplaces, and UI preferences. Key properties: model, effortLevel (low/medium/high for Opus 4.6), permissions.defaultMode (acceptEdits/bypassPermissions/default/delegate/dontAsk/plan), hooks with matchers, sandbox with network filtering, and attribution settings.
